questions.question: What is the maximum flow rate of rotameter?
What are the main parts of rotameter?

answers.b: the tapered metering tube and the float.

questions.question: What are the units of a rotameter?

answers.a: actual discharge equal to ideal discharge
answers.b: ratio of the ideal  discharge to the actual discharge
answers.c: ratio of the actual discharge to the ideal discharge
answers.d: actual discharge is greater than ideal discharge

answers.a: The product of flow area and flow velocity
answers.b: The ratio of flow area and flow velocity
answers.c: Equal flow area and flow velocity
answers.d: Greater flow area and flow velocity
